conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true cutaway 3D model with extruded walls, visible thickness, and an elevated/isometric viewing angle exposing interior spaces.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Clear wall height/thickness, readable interior volume, correct angled view, and clean roof removal; minor simplification of some corner/partition detailing.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall macro-zoning matches (living/kitchen top, two bedrooms bottom corners, bath core), but several secondary spaces/partitions (closet/coat/entry segmentation) are simplified or not faithfully placed, and openings (doors/windows) are not consistently aligned with the 2D plan.

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture present (sofa, table, beds) and kitchen counters/appliances included; bathroom fixtures simplified and not fully matching the 2D plan’s arrangement.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean, readable geometry with consistent materials and unobstructed presentation; lighting is adequate and no obvious mesh breakage.

detected_errors.description: Doors/windows are not faithfully reproduced: multiple window locations from the 2D plan (notably bedroom windows) are missing or not visible, and door placements/openings are simplified and do not match the plan precisely.
Layout fidelity loss in secondary spaces: closet/coat/entry hall segmentation and some internal partitions are simplified/shifted relative to the 2D plan.
Furniture and fixture configurations are generic and do not closely follow the plan’s specific placements (e.g., kitchen/bath details).

summary: A genuine and clean 3D cutaway with correct overall apartment zoning, but reduced fidelity in partitions and especially door/window placement compared to the 2D plan.
